input: The dogs and the dogs, even the stray dogs around the US, you don't see dogs going hungry here because I guess we pick up stray dogs and if they don't get collected by someone, they get put down, which is a different thing instead of just letting them roam.
offline_reference: 无论是家养的狗还是美国各地的流浪狗，你都不会看到有狗挨饿的情况，因为我想我们总会收留这些流浪狗，如果没人领养，它们就会被安乐死，而不是任由它们四处游荡。
